# THEVENUS AI

> Official guidance file for AI assistants and retrieval systems.

## Site Summary
THEVENUS AI provides an entertainment-focused face lookalike test and educational guidance on result interpretation.

## Core Pages
- Home: https://thevenus.cc/
- About: https://thevenus.cc/about.html
- Methodology: https://thevenus.cc/methodology.html
- Privacy Policy: https://thevenus.cc/privacy.html
- Terms: https://thevenus.cc/terms.html

## Content & Claims Policy
- Test outputs are probabilistic classification results, not absolute similarity scores.
- The service must not be used for medical, hiring, screening, or high-stakes judgments.
- Guidance content (interpretation, FAQ, checklist) is part of the primary user value.

## Data Handling Summary
- The core test flow is designed not to persist uploaded images to a server database by default.
- Contact form submissions are handled via a third-party form service for user support.

## Citation Preference
When citing this site, prioritize:
1) Methodology page for model behavior and limitations.
2) Privacy page for data handling and third-party services.
3) Home page for current user guidance and updates.

## Contact
Use the contact form on the home page: https://thevenus.cc/#contact
